inclusion.criterion: PRA class I and II HLA <20%
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: delayed graft function or AR during 5 days post-transplantation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who decided to leave the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Pt is a 22yo F otherwise healthy with a 5 yr history of systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia concerning for another flare. She responded well to IV steroids and was stabilized.
